title: spectre71
author: spectre71
content: Forgive me in advance I'm operating in a sleep deprived delirium. Welp, Tejas, my friends on the wrong side of the red river have been doing a bang up job on mining. Texas also has a unique place in the union which about all I know is they can leave. If legal I think it would be interesting to adopt it at a state level. Ideas? thoughts?
